titleStmt.title: Knovvledge of the times or, the resolution of the question, how long it shall be unto the end of wonders. By John Tillinghast, a servant of Jesus Christ.
titleStmt.author: Tillinghast, John, 1604-1655.

publicationStmt.publisher: by R.I. for L. Chapman, and are to be sold at the sign of the Crown in Popes-head Alley,

notesStmt.note: "An appendix" has separate dated title page; pagination and register are continuous.
With four final contents leaves followed by two advertisement leaves.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Crown in Popes-head Alley
